channel.title: propel on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in propel on Vegetable Programing

item.title: propelでor条件を使用したい
item.description: $c->add(TableNamePeer::CLUMN_A, 1); $criterion1 = $c->getNewCriterion(TableNamePeer::CLUMN_B, 'hoge'); $criterion1->addOr($c->getNewCriterion(TableNamePeer::CLUMN_B, 'piyo')); ==> select * from table_name where (条件1 or 条件2) Criteriaで複雑な条件のクエリを書く - Qiita
